## CategoryStack2d class

Assigns a value to [T2dRelativeZIndexTrait](./cartesian-2d.t2drelativezindextrait.md) based on the position in the stack. Entities towards the top of the stack have higher values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CategoryStack2d 
```
